title: Aiming For Harem Queen in Different World –Story of Self-Proclaimed Ordinary High School Girl Struggling in Different World– - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shoujo Ai
tags: Adventurers   All-Girls School   Angels   Demi-Humans   Doting Parents   Fallen Angels   Fantasy World   God-human Relationship   Goddesses   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Loli   Magic   R-15   Race Change   Resurrection   Skill Assimilation   Student Council   Transported to Another World   Yandere
author: Kuroki Hitomi   黒き瞳
description:
When I took a nap on the school roof, I, Ichijou Unagi had been brought to different world without realizing it.

I went to the Adventure Guild with a wizard-like blond girl and confirmed my skill, it was a mysterious skill that got stronger as I befriended girls.

And then, shocking truth was spoken from the heaven.

Eh!? I was yuri?

And doing cute thing with cute girls?

There is no other way. If it became like this, I’ll start over and aim for a yuri harem!>
